text:
If one for example loads the Homepage of the default pub in BXE or the form
based editors, the homepage.rng is not found.

---------------------------- from console ---------------------------------
 WARN  org.apache.lenya.cms.cocoon.acting.OneFormEditorSaveAction.act():115  -
Will not be validated. No such schema:
/home/roku/workspace/cocoon/apache-lenya-1.2.x/build/lenya/webapp/lenya/pubs/default/config/doctypes/schemas/homepage.rng
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
creator: roku@apache.org
gregor@apache.org
text:
why is there a homepage doctype????

from parameter-doctype.xmap:

    <map:pipeline>
      <!-- {area}/{uri} -->
      <map:match pattern="*/index.html">
        <map:generate type="serverpages" src="../../config/parameters/default.xsp">
          <map:parameter name="value" value="homepage"/>
	</map:generate>
	<map:serialize type="xml"/>
      </map:match>
    </map:pipeline>


i will roll this back (there is no homepage doctype) unless someone comes up
with the missing rng, xsl etc this week.
